text: GeckoAI v1.0 was developed and maintained by a solo developer!
GeckoAI is powered by Next.js, giving it lightning-fast page loads and server-side rendering.
We use React.js to build dynamic, interactive user interfaces.
A lot of the animations you see are possible with Framer Motion!
User accounts are secure and convenient with Google Identity Services.
File uploads and storage are handled by AWS S3, keeping your data safe and scalable.
We use a Neon PostgreSQL database to store user data.
The AI in GeckoAI is powered by the Gemini API!
We integrate with the Google Calendar API to let you schedule events conveniently.
The main programming language used to develop GeckoAI is TypeScript.
You can offer suggestions by emailing geckoaihelp@gmail.com!
GeckoAI v2.0 will offer TailLink access to Apple Calendar!
Icons in the site are provided by the public library React Icons.
GeckoAI was created to help students organize their semesters effortlessly.
開発者のお気に入りのアニメはハンター×ハンターです.
The iconic light green we use is known in our codebase as 'asparagus.'
The darker green we use is known in our codebase as 'broccoli.'
Customize GeckoAI's appearance in the settings menu.
GeckoAI's source code is publicly available!
GeckoAI is entrusted by students at dozens of different universities!
GeckoAI Plus can be purchased at an 80% discount using the code 'GECKOAI2025'!
